title.rendered: Blue River Express White Water Rafting Trip

<title>Blue River Express White Water Rafting Trip | AVA Rafting</title>
<meta name="description" content="Raft Summit County's favorite stretch of whitewater - the Blue River! Our Blue River Express trip is about 2 hours on the water and is located about 30 minutes from Breckenridge." />
